ComicInfo.Summary: The Drowning Man Part 2 (or I Left My Life in San Francisco): Deadpool sleeps with Siryn at the "Field of Dreams" baseball field but, in the glorious light of morning, Deadpool has a serious case of coyote ugly as his partner in whoopie turns out to be none other than Typhoid Mary in disguise. Still reeling from this stomach churning turn of events, Deadpool discovers that Weasel has been visiting Al behind his back. He puts the pair of betrayers in "the box" and heads for Golden Gate Park for a final confrontation with T-Ray which concludes his less than stellar day in a rather appropriate manner as T-Ray kills him.
ComicInfo.Title: The Drowning Man Part 2 (or I Left My Life in San Francisco)
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
